title: (Biological) Anthropology Field Workers Fund
description: To support field workers integral to research in the Dept of Anthropology at CU Boulder including travel, education enhancement and expenses associated with bringing individuals to the US.  Strong preference is for field workers from rural West Africa.
marketingContent: To support field workers integral to research in the Dept of Anthropology at CU Boulder including travel, education enhancement and expenses associated with bringing individuals to the US.  Strong preference is for field workers from rural West Africa.
